original_title: You Can Last Longer: Solutions for Ejaculatory Control
overview: Dr. Derek C. Polonsky of Harvard Medical School and certified sex therapist Marian E. Dunn lead you through this unique video guide for achieving better ejaculatory control. As you watch live couples demonstrate in explicit detail, you'll learn the step-by-step self-help techniques prescribed by sex therapists in private practice. The Stop-Start Technique and the Squeeze Technique shown here have been proven to be 90% effective in gaining better ejaculatory control.
tagline: America's top sex educators help you put more pleasure and excitement in your intimate relationships.
title: You Can Last Longer: Solutions for Ejaculatory Control
